channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:50 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 09:50 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:50 Plowing of anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages.
